Question: Tianjin Hualai Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Tianjin Hualai Technology Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Hualai's smart home cameras offer advanced features and integrations into Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud solutions for IoT and video services.
- The partnership with Xailient Inc. enables privacy-compliant AI automation for smart camera designs capable of providing robust, cost-effective, and scalable solutions with quick time to market.
- The collaboration integrates Hualai's camera products with Xailient's AI models and algorithms for object detection, facial recognition, and anomaly detection, reducing engineering time and effort, and lowering schedule and cost risks associated with launching smart home products.

For more information, visit the company's website at https://www.hualaikeji.com/
